layout.singingstanza: I will en -- ter His gates with thanks -- giv -- ing in my heart; I will en -- ter His courts with praise. I will say this is the day that the Lord has made. I will re -- joice for He has made me glad. He has made me glad, He has made me glad, I will re -- joice for He has made me glad. He has made me glad, He has made me glad, I will re -- joice for He has made me glad.

lyrics.stanza: I will enter His gates with thanksgiving in my heart; I will enter His courts with praise. I will say this is the day that the Lord has made. I will rejoice for He has made me glad. He has made me glad, He has made me glad, I will rejoice for He has made me glad. He has made me glad, He has made me glad, I will rejoice for He has made me glad.
